title: They LOVE Bloomberg, FROZEN 2 SPOILERS 11.26.19
itunes:title: They LOVE Bloomberg, FROZEN 2 SPOILERS 11.26.19
description:
In episode 524, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Chris Crofton to discuss Lev Parnas handing over receipts to the House Intelligence Committee, an overall impeachment update, Michael Bloomberg entering presidential race, Adnan Syed getting denied a new trial, Frozen 2 killing the box office, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. WATCH: Boys Do Fall In Love - Robin Gibb
  2. House Intelligence Committee in possession of video, audio recordings from Giuliani associate Lev Parnas
  3. Impeachment inquiry live updates: Schiff says report will be forwarded to Judiciary Committee soon after Congress returns next week
  4. A conservative columnist admits it: “We were wrong about stop-and-frisk”
  5. New York Drops Unit That Spied on Muslims
  6. ADNAN SYED SUPREME COURT SAYS NO NEW TRIAL ... Life Sentence Upheld for 'Serial' Subject
  7. 'Frozen 2' Box Office: All the Records Broken
  8. Disney signed a contract with Indigenous people before making Frozen II
  9. Frozen 2’s Bizarre Storyline About Reparations, Explained

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
